eg

Class TabbedDocuments

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.TabbedDocuments

  • public class TabbedDocuments
extends java.lang.Object
    The documents in the tabs.

    Documents are represented by objects of EditableDocument which are each displayed in a tab by an associated object of EditArea.

    If the tab bar is set invisible the single open document is also referred to as the 'selected' document

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabbedDocuments(MainWin mw, Formatter format) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the selected document and may ask for saving; opens a new blank document if the only one open was closed
      void closeAll()
      Closes all documents and may ask for saving; opens a new blank document if all documents were closed
      boolean closeAllForExit()
      Closes all documents and may ask for saving; stores different properties in Prefs
      void open()
      Opens a document with a file selected in the file chooser.
      void openBlankDocument()
      Opens a new blank document with the currently selected language.
      void print()
      Prints the text content of the selected document to a printer
      void save()
      Saves the text content of the selected document; uses 'save as' if the document has no file or a file that no more exists
      void saveAll()
      Saves the text content in all open documents; uses 'save as' for documents that have no file or a file that no more exists
      void saveAs()
      Saves the text content of the selected document as a new file that is specified in the file chooser
      void saveCopy()
      Saves a copy of the text content of the selected document as new file that is specified in the file chooser; the file is not set in the document

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public TabbedDocuments(MainWin mw,

        Parameters:

        format - the Formatter

    • Method Detail

      • openBlankDocument

        public void openBlankDocument()
        Opens a new blank document with the currently selected language. Creates a new tab if the tab bar is visible and may ask to save before opening otherwise.

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens a document with a file selected in the file chooser. Creates a new tab if the tab bar is visible and may ask to save before opening otherwise.

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves the text content of the selected document; uses 'save as' if the document has no file or a file that no more exists

      • saveAll

        public void saveAll()
        Saves the text content in all open documents; uses 'save as' for documents that have no file or a file that no more exists

      • saveAs

        public void saveAs()
        Saves the text content of the selected document as a new file that is specified in the file chooser

      • saveCopy

        public void saveCopy()
        Saves a copy of the text content of the selected document as new file that is specified in the file chooser; the file is not set in the document

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the selected document and may ask for saving; opens a new blank document if the only one open was closed

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll()
        Closes all documents and may ask for saving; opens a new blank document if all documents were closed

      • closeAllForExit

        public boolean closeAllForExit()
        Closes all documents and may ask for saving; stores different properties in Prefs
        Returns:
        true if all tabs were closed, false otherwise

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the text content of the selected document to a printer
